tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I approached the doctor because I read ****** reviews about him online. He seemed to be very learned when I visited but unfortunately my wisdom tooth extraction experience did not go well.
While the process was being done, the dentist pull out my entire tooth with so much force that I could feel my entire head being shaken up and even after multiple anaesthesia injections I could feel the tooth, the nerves being shaken *** ****** *** **********. ** *** * ********** ********** *** ****It took 3 sittings and one month of swollen face on one side and one week of bleeding in middle of night post removal to heal from it.
And today I have a condition where that half side of my face pains whenever I have a bit of stress. That same tooth nerve pains and triggers migraine. I wonder if it is because of the way the dentist here did my extraction. I also got my other 2 wisdom tooth extracted by another doctor from another clinic, it took 5 minutes and no pain. **** ***** **** **** ** *** ******* ** ********** *** ********** *** not good with this particular experienced dentist.
